dialogue.introduction: H-hello, I'm Abukuma, a light cruiser.
dialogue.library_intro: I'm Abukuma of Nagara-class light cruisers. Yes... to be honest, I don't like Kitakami. What's with her... but, I endured and fixed my beautiful bow! Ushio too, thanks.
dialogue.secretary1: Abukuma's name, have you remembered it?.
dialogue.secretary2: My name, can you write it in kanji?
dialogue.secretary3: Ow-owww! Please don't touch me too much! My bangs are fragile you know! Admiral, you're a bit like Kitakami.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Geez! I thought you might have forgotten about me!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, please don't overdo it, okay?
dialogue.wedding: Admiral~, thanks for waiting! I want to say couple of words of thanks to you… because you looked after me with such care, I got a bit more confident. Admiral, thank you.
dialogue.show_players_score: Admiral! It's a written report! How's the results?
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Huh, no way, me?! I-I can go but...
dialogue.equipment1: Looking forward to it? I really am!
dialogue.equipment2: I understand! My strength is necessary, right?
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Seems a bit long for a bath, don't you think?
dialogue.docking_complete: It seems that repairs have finished!
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet has returned to the home port!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: I'm waiting for this! B-but it's not like I'm looking forward to it that much.
dialogue.attack: When it's time to act, I will do it!
dialogue.night_battle: Well then, it's night battle, but I will not lose to some night battle idiot somewhere.
dialogue.mvp: Even someone like me can do it if I try!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Stop it! My bow has barely recovered!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Am I really just no good? But, I don't want to lose like this!
dialogue.sunk: I've been badly damaged... hey, Ushio-chan, are you by my side? Can I leave the rest with you...?
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Its two years, two years. For me, it is super OK. Admiral, congratulations
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: There's a lot of rainy days, it's the rainy season huh... the shiratsuyu class are frolicking around without a care in the world. ... destroyers, annoying. ... oh no, I said a certain somebody's line!?
dialogue.early_summer_2015: It sure is taking longer for the sun to set, isn't it? Looks like summer is right around the corner. (sigh) ...and when it's here those guys from the 3rd torpedo squadron will be a whole lot noisier.
dialogue.midsummer_2015: This burning sun, it's summer, isn't it. I'm a little worried about my skin getting sunburnt. Um...are you listening, admiral?
dialogue.fall_2015: Autumn... this season reminds me of that night battle. Such beautiful fires. Yet so scary. Both at the same time. Ehehe, it's strange, isn't it, admiral?
dialogue.christmas_2015: Merry Christmas, yes! Ashigara and the others invited us to their party tonight. What shoud we do, admiral? Umm... If it's me...
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Fuwaaa, I'm so busy! Hey, Admiral you should also help out with the naval base's cleaning! Here hold this! Dust spotted at starboard!
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year! Abukuma and everyone in the First Torpedo Squadron will be counting on you again this year!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: I heard during Setsubun, you eat a certain number of beans based on your age... Ah, let's not think this too deeply. Yeah, that's OK for me!

hourly.0000: It's already 12 o'clock midnight! Admiral, you idiot!
hourly.0100: It's 1 o'clock already? My skin is getting chapped... I'll go sleep first~
hourly.0300: A late night 3 o'clock snack is not necessary
hourly.0400: 4 in the morning!? You've got to be kidding
hourly.0500: Admiral, it's 5 o'clock. It's not bad by now
hourly.0600: It's 6 o'clock already. I'll go do my hair
hourly.0700: It's 7 in the morning. Hey, how's my bangs?
hourly.0800: It's 8 o'clock. Admiral, shall we also go together today?
hourly.0900: It's 9 o'clock. What should we do today?
hourly.1000: It's 10 o'clock. Time for real life?
hourly.1100: It's 11 o'clock. A bit more to lunch!
hourly.1200: It's 12 o'clock. Hey, I want to eat delicious food.
hourly.1400: It's 2pm are you not sleepy? Ah? Only me?
hourly.1500: It's 3 o'clock now. Are you going to take an afternoon nap? What about a snack?
hourly.1600: It is now 4 o'clock. The fatigue is slowly settling in
hourly.1700: It's 5 o'clock! I'll go fix my hair~
hourly.1900: It's 7 o'clock! Study, work! And then Kancolle!
hourly.2000: Evening 8pm call! Admiral, how are you doo-ing-?
hourly.2100: It is now 9 at night, soon it will be time for a night battle
hourly.2200: It's 10 o'clock! Let's take a short break
hourly.2300: It is now 11 o'clock. A very critical time!
